description: Shiva standing in profile facing right, wearing gold and red, with hands together, on a rock next to a river; Parvati standing in profile facing left, dressed in gold, under a tree with one hand on hip and the other resting on a tree limb above her head; many colorful birds perched in the trees; many pink and red flowers in the trees and along the river bank; at bottom right is a grouping of three women in red and gold dress, smaller in size than main figures; blue floral inside border with red-lined and red-mottled outer border
medium: Opaque watercolor heightened with gold on paper
title: Shiva and Parvati with Companions
